ygData.subject: RE: Diamond Dust.....
ygData.msgSnippet: Always wondered.  I was only a wee 20th or so at the time so never messed with him.  Back to ye old drawing board then.  Too bad, Meldrath might actually have
ygData.messageBody:
Always wondered. I was only a wee 20th or so at the time so never messed
with him. Back to ye old drawing board then. Too bad, Meldrath might
actually have made sense, what ever was I thinking, Verant make sense?

Leagnomo

-----Original Message-----
From: Eric Kenslow [mailto:eric@...]
Sent: Tuesday, January 04, 2000 11:29 AM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Diamond Dust.....


From: "Eric Kenslow" <eric@...>

He's level 35 or so, and he gets killed even more often than I do :)
